玣字的基本解释

玣
biàn
玉名。
玉饰弁。

玣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［biàn］
［《集韻》皮變切，去綫，並。］
玉制的弁饰。

玣字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　玣； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页728第07
【集韻】皮變切，音卞。玉飾弁也。【左傳·僖二十八年】子玉自爲瓊弁玉纓。【釋文】弁，本又作玣。皮彥反。　【類篇】或作㺹。

考證：〔【左傳·僖二十八年】楚子自爲瓊弁玉纓。〕　謹按原文作楚子玉，楚字可省玉字不可省，謹改楚子爲子玉。
玣字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
玣字的起名意思

指玉名或玉饰弁。

玣

[①]［biàn］
["Jiyun" the skin is cut, the thread is removed, and the. ]

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　玣; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 728 Page 07
[Jiyun] The skin changes and the sound is Bian. Jade decorated Bian also. [Zuo Zhuan·Xi Twenty-Eight Years] Ziyu is Qiong Bian Yuying himself. 【Explanation】Ban, this book is made again. Pi Yan countered.　【Classification】Or make 㺹. Textual research: [[Zuo Zhuan·Xi Twenty-Eight Years] Chu Zi is Qiong Bian Yuying himself. 〕　I would like to make Chu Ziyu according to the original text. The word Chu can save jade and the word cannot be saved. I would like to change Chu Zi to Ziyu.
